description.es: Pescado fresco marinado en jugo de limón, ají, cebolla morada y cilantro.
description.en: Fresh fish marinated in lime juice, chili, red onion, and cilantro.

description.es: Trozos de lomo salteados con cebolla, tomate, ají amarillo y papas fritas, acompañado de arroz.
description.en: Strips of beef loin stir-fried with onions, tomatoes, yellow chili, and french fries, served with rice.

description.es: Postre tradicional peruano a base de manjar blanco y merengue de oporto.
description.en: Traditional Peruvian dessert made from dulce de leche and port meringue.
